content: Conto Single vendor script ver 1.1 by ContoscriptHaving all the features present. it is a customization designed expressly to be used as single vendor shop with btc payment feature.Conto is a beautiful Vendor script with BTC support it has fixed many features and ready to use.Features:* Mobile-Friendly Design * Unlimited Products* Unlimited Categories* One Page Checkout* Multiple Shipping Support* Product Reviews & Ratings* Support Chat Integration* User friendly Admin PanelAdmin PanelAdministrators can access every feature on admin panel.Btc paymentBITCOIN payment system has been implemented. Increase your safety, privacy and anonimity avoiding to relay upon a third party payment system. The system will generate a BITCOIN address/private key pair for every single order. Real time conversion from any currency to BTC. Quick access to the BITCOIN address private key by providing the admin password (It is stored in an encrypted html file). Easily check if a payment was done directly in the order details. We provide free install on every host!PM on bitcointalk for more informationSCREENSHOTS    https://ibb.co/bmHpngThttps://ibb.co/52smgwBhttps://ibb.co/0GqBcSVhttps://ibb.co/6mJ1Jgjhttps://ibb.co/0ZSvDLL
